result.html: Bhí mise óg tráth freisinI was young once, too.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mise óg tráṫ freisinI was young once, too.

result.eng: I was there when I was young.
result.ga: Bhí mé ann nuair a bhí mé óg
result.orig: Bhí mé ann nuair a bhí mé óg
result.html: Bhí mé ann nuair a bhí mé ógI was there when I was young.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ann nuair a ḃí mé ógI was there when I was young.

result.ga: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aici
result.orig: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aici
result.html: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aiciShe was young and healthy.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sise óg agus ḃí a sláinte aiciShe was young and healthy.

result.eng: We've had a small child for a year.
result.ga: Tá leanbh óg againn le bliain
result.orig: Tá leanbh óg againn le bliain
result.html: Tá leanbh óg againn le bliainWe've had a small child for a year.
result.ponchtml: Tá leanḃ óg againn le bliainWe've had a small child for a year.

result.eng: It was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.orig: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.html: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ionaḋ gurḃ é an saol acadúil a ḃí i ndán don ḃuaċaill óg agus a ṁáṫair ina doċtúir leiġisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.

result.eng: They were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.orig: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.html: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostaċ Níorḃ é sin do Ṡéimí é ḃí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
